short_description:
My first Python project.
A simple calculator.
long_description:
This was my first Python project. It's a simple calculator that reads in plus ('+'), minus ('-'), multiplied ('*'), divided ('/') and two numbers. It then calculates the two numbers depending on the value of the symbol the user entered.

It took me a full year to complete the project due to an overload of work. Work was all like: 'Ooooh, come here! Let's do some more menial tasks', and I was like 'No, work! I don't want to! I want to program my calculator!'. But, alas, work goes first due to me needing a salary to eat and pay rent and such.

Oh no. I'm starting to use this as some sort of blog, aren't I? That's not good... I mean I need to show this site to possible people who would like to hire me! MOOOOOOOM! How do I delete stuff off of my website, again?

...

She's not answering... Why am I still typing?!

Note

Due to the amazing Flask-portfolio both scientists and doctors were easily able to find the master of calulators. With the newly-found power of the calculator doctors could finally find a cure for several deadly diseases, while scientists managed to calculate solutions for the world's largest energy problems.

The founder of the calculator was crowned both king and queen of Python and earned enough money to move out of the mother's basement. The founder - or master - now lives high up in the mountains where small groups of trainees are sent to learn the art of Python...
